name: IOMETE
headline: The Self-hosted Data Lakehouse Platform
description: The IOMETE Self-Hosted Data Lakehouse Platform unifies all data - regardless of where the data resides - enabling large-scale analytics (BI/ML/AI) on the entire data set. IOMETE runs always in the customer's environment, whether on premises, on public cloud or private cloud thereby maximizing data security, data privacy and data ownership while reducing cost.

founders.name: Vusal Dadalov, Founder
founders.description:
Vusal Dadalov is cofounder & CEO at iomete, the first complete data infrastructure delivered as a single platform.

My background is Distributed Systems Engineer. Previously worked at Uber, Careem, OLX Group, Azercell Telecom

founders.name: Piet Jan de Bruin, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder IOMETE | The Next-Gen Data Lakehouse Platform for AI and Analytics.

From 2016 to 2020 I was CFO and CEO of Tuft & Needle (www.tn.com) which we grew to $200m in revenue while remaining bootstrapped and profitable (exit to Advent International late 2018).

**The smart alternative to Snowflake, Databricks and Cloudera.**
# The Self-Hosted Data Lakehouse Platform
Smart users worldwide are saying yes to IOMETE and no to data breaches and overpriced SAAS schemes designed to lock you in. Runs on premises and on public and private clouds.
[Book a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/659ca9dc2db87ad28cc1151e_arrow-right-line.svg)](https://www.iomete.com/<https:/calendly.com/iomete/iomete-discovery-call>)[Learn More](https://www.iomete.com/<#features-section>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a29426aefd9be930bc5112_Lakehouses.svg)
### Connect to any source
Wide variety connections and integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a289399132d6f677d6ed93_Redash%20Logo.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/64824708f424f64d0de83c24_iceberg-55.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c7734ecb40dcc40710d5f_spark.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c8c41849aad152eed6215_Line-decoration.svg)
A modern and open lakehouse
IOMETE features the Apache Iceberg table format. Get access to ACID transactions, time travel, snapshots, schema evolution, data versioning, concurrency control, metadata management, and partitioning. Powered by the Apache Spark engine, IOMETE is fast, versatile, and scalable.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b9b1b8a5a55dc0773844_cloud_new.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b98ddf2631cdcd225391_azure.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b99b27cf7a136a4e8353_google%20cloud.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b9cfdf2631cdcd22adc2_priv_cloud.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477c00bcda083d6ecc679d8_Group%20196.svg)
Securely deployed where your data lives
IOMETE can be deployed on-premises in your data centers, in the cloud or in a hybrid configuration. In all cases the data does not leave your trust perimeter, guaranteeing maximum data security and ownership.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c7747dff483620728f011_graph_others.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c774fdca2276632be2124_graph_iomete.svg)
Disruptive, transparent pricing
Cost matters. No surprise bills. No lock-ins. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/642c0db826b6f1b62e0ae7a5_line_new.svg)
[Book a demo](https://www.iomete.com/<https:/calendly.com/iomete/iomete-discovery-call>)
## Sync. Prepare. Consume.
Unified data for analytics, ML and AI made easy.
SYNC
## Sync from a wide range of compatible data sources
or use query federation to unify your data for analytical and ML/AI workloads.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/658da668fe1e07b8f6c549af_Sync%20image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f7ed9161ad7e62621_Icon_change.svg)
Sync or ingest from a wide range of compatible data sources
Use built-in serverless Spark jobs to sync data from your operational database and other data sources into a lakehouse or use a third party ELT tool to ingest your data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f16414006c18a61e3_Icon_braces.svg)
Access your data with query federation
IOMETE allows you to query disparate datasources in the same system with the same SQL. Federated queries can access your object storage, relational databases, No-SQL system, all in the same query. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f7ed916ac8de62628_Icon_airplay.svg)
Enjoy the benefits of near real-time streaming
IOMETE's powerful Spark Job Cluster makes it easy to analyze realtime streaming data. With IOMETE, users can ingest and process large volumes of realtime data from a variety of sources - including IoT devices, social media feeds and financial transactions. 
PREPARE
## Transform, clean and organize your data with SQL, Spark and DBT.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a29426bd0b724104a9ab0e_SQL%20Editor.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4159205bca769fe9cea_Icon-graph.svg)
Transform your data at any scale
Built-in Apache Spark can handle large datasets by dividing them into smaller partitions and processing them in parallel in clusters. This makes it highly scalable, fast and suitable for up to petabytes datasets. Apache Spark is flexible and handles SQL, Java, Scala, and Python. IOMETE offers a seamless integration with DBT.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4152a7f8bcb2d403571_Icon-cube.svg)
Run ad-hoc analysis with the SQL editor
The built-in SQL editor provides a toolkit to make it easy to write SQL queries with features such as search, autocomplete and schema explorer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a233e44621b6acf84f3d77_Data%20Security.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415ed6184f4eb290772_Icon_db.svg)
Organize your data with the built-in data catalog
The IOMETE data catalog provides Google-like search, index and discovery for your data. It also allows you to document the data you own so you can stay organized.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415ed61844c5e290773_Icon-shield.svg)
Manage data access and become compliant with data regulations
Leverage advanced data access controls to keep your data secure. IOMETE allows you to manage access on person or team level, as well as on table, row and column level. This makes it easy to become and stay compliant with regulations such as SOC2, HIPAA and GDPR.
CONSUME
## Run blazing-fast analytics, ML and AI models
and enjoy the benefits of having access to relevant, high-quality data for analysis and decision making by men and machines.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/658da68d61cdc35434cc14d2_Animation3-convert.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4151bf6469ab4314d4f_Icon-chain.svg)
Run blazing-fast analytics on quality data
It’s very easy to connect IOMETE to your favorite BI tool - including Tableau, PowerBI, Metabase and Apache Superset - and enjoy the benefits of organized, high-quality data for analytical and dashboarding purposes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415cc916a2a345516a9_Icon-merge.svg)
ML and AI made easy
With features such as notebook service, training ML jobs on the Spark cluster and unlimited time-travel on the data lake, IOMETE makes it easy to run your ML and AI models whether it is on premise or in the cloud.
## Explore IOMETE use cases
### On premise and hybrid deployment options
Explore how IOMETE can be securely deployed in your trust perimeter.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641ca6716dd0566e41f69dd3_home%201.svg)
IOMETE on premise deployment
Enjoy cloud-like performance with the benefits of on premise.
[Learn More](https://www.iomete.com/</cases/iomete-on-premise>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641ca6716dd0566e41f69dd3_home%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641ca668be2a98804e3fc1ae_cloud-lightning%201.svg)

You want to know a little secret? We started out as a cloud-only data lakehouse...
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641ca4f77d47842d589d34b7_aws-2.svg)

Learn about the benefits of running IOMETE on Google Cloud.

## Top-Tier Data Protection Standards
We adhere to the highest standards of security and privacy. Proudly displaying our SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA certifications, we ensure that your information is handled in compliance with data regulations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a0850d7a98eaf45a8c5db9_soc2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a085264ac47a65082eeba0_gdpr.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a0851bd018b401a02075ec_hipaa.svg)
## Ready? Try it today.
Start with a Free Community version to see what IOMETE can do.Interested in Enterprise? Book a call with us!

**The smart alternative to Snowflake, Databricks and Cloudera.**
# The Self-Hosted Data Lakehouse Platform
Smart users worldwide are saying yes to IOMETE and no to data breaches and overpriced SAAS schemes designed to lock you in. Runs on premises and on public and private clouds.
Book a Demo![⟨28⟩](https://www.iomete.com/<https:/calendly.com/iomete/iomete-discovery-call>)Learn More⟨29⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a29426aefd9be930bc5112_Lakehouses.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c8c41849aad152eed6215_Line-decoration.svg)
A modern and open lakehouse
IOMETE features the Apache Iceberg table format. Get access to ACID transactions, time travel, snapshots, schema evolution, data versioning, concurrency control, metadata management, and partitioning. Powered by the Apache Spark engine, IOMETE is fast, versatile, and scalable.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b9b1b8a5a55dc0773844_cloud_new.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b98ddf2631cdcd225391_azure.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b99b27cf7a136a4e8353_google%20cloud.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477b9cfdf2631cdcd22adc2_priv_cloud.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/6477c00bcda083d6ecc679d8_Group%20196.svg)
Securely deployed where your data lives
IOMETE can be deployed on-premises in your data centers, in the cloud or in a hybrid configuration. In all cases the data does not leave your trust perimeter, guaranteeing maximum data security and ownership.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c7747dff483620728f011_graph_others.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641c774fdca2276632be2124_graph_iomete.svg)
Disruptive, transparent pricing
Cost matters. No surprise bills. No lock-ins. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/642c0db826b6f1b62e0ae7a5_line_new.svg)
Book a demo⟨27⟩
## Sync. Prepare. Consume.
Unified data for analytics, ML and AI made easy.
SYNC
## Sync from a wide range of compatible data sources
or use query federation to unify your data for analytical and ML/AI workloads.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/658da668fe1e07b8f6c549af_Sync%20image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f7ed9161ad7e62621_Icon_change.svg)
Sync or ingest from a wide range of compatible data sources
Use built-in serverless Spark jobs to sync data from your operational database and other data sources into a lakehouse or use a third party ELT tool to ingest your data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f16414006c18a61e3_Icon_braces.svg)
Access your data with query federation
IOMETE allows you to query disparate datasources in the same system with the same SQL. Federated queries can access your object storage, relational databases, No-SQL system, all in the same query. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641d879f7ed916ac8de62628_Icon_airplay.svg)
Enjoy the benefits of near real-time streaming
IOMETE's powerful Spark Job Cluster makes it easy to analyze realtime streaming data. With IOMETE, users can ingest and process large volumes of realtime data from a variety of sources - including IoT devices, social media feeds and financial transactions. 
PREPARE
## Transform, clean and organize your data with SQL, Spark and DBT.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a29426bd0b724104a9ab0e_SQL%20Editor.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4159205bca769fe9cea_Icon-graph.svg)
Transform your data at any scale
Built-in Apache Spark can handle large datasets by dividing them into smaller partitions and processing them in parallel in clusters. This makes it highly scalable, fast and suitable for up to petabytes datasets. Apache Spark is flexible and handles SQL, Java, Scala, and Python. IOMETE offers a seamless integration with DBT.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4152a7f8bcb2d403571_Icon-cube.svg)
Run ad-hoc analysis with the SQL editor
The built-in SQL editor provides a toolkit to make it easy to write SQL queries with features such as search, autocomplete and schema explorer.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/65a233e44621b6acf84f3d77_Data%20Security.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415ed6184f4eb290772_Icon_db.svg)
Organize your data with the built-in data catalog
The IOMETE data catalog provides Google-like search, index and discovery for your data. It also allows you to document the data you own so you can stay organized.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415ed61844c5e290773_Icon-shield.svg)
Manage data access and become compliant with data regulations
Leverage advanced data access controls to keep your data secure. IOMETE allows you to manage access on person or team level, as well as on table, row and column level. This makes it easy to become and stay compliant with regulations such as SOC2, HIPAA and GDPR.
CONSUME
## Run blazing-fast analytics, ML and AI models
and enjoy the benefits of having access to relevant, high-quality data for analysis and decision making by men and machines.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/658da68d61cdc35434cc14d2_Animation3-convert.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da4151bf6469ab4314d4f_Icon-chain.svg)
Run blazing-fast analytics on quality data
It’s very easy to connect IOMETE to your favorite BI tool - including Tableau, PowerBI, Metabase and Apache Superset - and enjoy the benefits of organized, high-quality data for analytical and dashboarding purposes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625843c6d847c8dca08551d1/641da415cc916a2a345516a9_Icon-merge.svg)
ML and AI made easy
With features such as notebook service, training ML jobs on the Spark cluster and unlimited time-travel on the data lake, IOMETE makes it easy to run your ML and AI models whether it is on premise or in the cloud.

## Top-Tier Data Protection Standards
We adhere to the highest standards of security and privacy. Proudly displaying our SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA certifications, we ensure that your information is handled in compliance with data regulations.

generated_description:
**IOMETE: Redefining Data Management**

Founded in 2020 and proudly part of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, IOMETE has carved out a niche as a self-hosted data lakehouse platform. Located in Mountain View, California, with a compact but mighty team of 12, IOMETE is on a mission to simplify data handling across various environments—be it on-premises, public cloud, or private cloud. Their platform is designed for large-scale analytics, allowing businesses to seamlessly integrate and analyze all their data while ensuring robust security and ownership.

### What is IOMETE?

IOMETE’s unique selling point is providing a unified data experience. Unlike many traditional platforms that lock users into costly subscriptions and cloud dependencies—complete with the risks of data breaches—IOMETE runs directly within the customer's infrastructure. This model empowers users with full data ownership and privacy while drastically reducing costs. It embodies a modern approach to leveraging and securing data, making it an appealing alternative to existing giants like Snowflake, Databricks, and Cloudera.

### Core Features

1. **Data Integration:** IOMETE allows for smooth synchronization from a wide range of data sources. This includes everything from operational databases to IoT devices, making it adaptable to any enterprise's unique data landscape.

2. **Real-time Analytics:** The platform is powered by Apache Spark, enabling users to conduct real-time data processing and analytics. The ability to run complex machine learning and AI models on live data opens up new avenues for businesses to glean insights swiftly.

3. **Robust Security:** With certifications that adhere to SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA, IOMETE positions itself as a leader in data security. The platform’s architecture ensures that sensitive data stays within the secure perimeter of the enterprise.

4. **Flexible Deployment:** Users can opt for on-premises, hybrid, or full cloud deployment, fostering a customizable experience depending on their technical needs and regulatory environments.

5. **Disruptive Pricing:** IOMETE’s transparent pricing model promises no surprise bills or lock-ins, making it not just a smart choice on paper, but a financially savvy one, too.

### Who's Behind IOMETE?

With backing from investors like Nan and roots in Silicon Valley's vibrant startup ecosystem, IOMETE is at the forefront of data lakehouse innovation. Their approach is particularly suited for enterprises looking to maximize the value of their data while staying compliant with evolving data privacy regulations.

### In Summary

IOMETE isn’t just another data platform; it's a revolutionary approach to data management that champions user empowerment, security, and adaptability. If you’re tired of complex, high-cost data solutions that leave you exposed and frustrated, IOMETE offers a refreshing alternative that combines the best of analytics with the peace of mind that your data is secure and under your control.

For more insights, explore their [website](https://www.iomete.com/) to discover how IOMETE can transform your data strategy.
